attributes.action: Make it law to wear a mask in any public place !
attributes.additional_details: Why ? Because it needs doing NOW, stop pandering to the fact someone will be upset about petty things, just do what is the right thing to do and enforce it, and enforce it with heavy fines......Everyone needs to wear a mask in any public place indoors or outdoors, it's the only effective way to control this virus and keep all businesses open, don't kill the economy, act now before it's too late !!!
attributes.background: I need you to wake up, make it law to wear masks and keep distanced from eachother in any public place, these are the the things that need enforcing on people, too many are taking advantage of these exemptions landyards. NOBODY should be free to spread a deadly virus !

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554917
